string.name: create_account_text
string.u: Not registered yet? Create new account

resources.string: Password must contain at least 1 Capital Alphabet, 1 Number and 1 Special Character.
Are you sure want to sign out?

A must-have app for people who are interested in travelling. The app provides users with various features, from choosing their desired destination, to planning an entine itinerary or choosing an existent one, to making bookings and even be rewarded by visiting different places with our awarding system. The app is completely free to use and should you have a suggestion for us or want to report a bug you can send us an email at support@planyourtrip.com.
